entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near noon. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 5.
